generatorMeta.name: Data Quality Center 10.4.0

addedColumn.name: std_email
addedColumn.comm:comment: Standardized value of the email address - contains only valid values.

addedColumn.name: std_name
addedColumn.comm:comment: Column that stores the email address owner if recognised.

addedColumn.name: out_email
addedColumn.comm:comment: The best existing value of email.

addedColumn.name: exp_email
addedColumn.comm:comment: Explanations if invalid, cleansed or matched.

addedColumn.name: sco_email
addedColumn.comm:comment: Data quality score for value of email.

properties.comm:comment: Internal_columns
Looks up src email in whitelist dictionary.
Email_not_whitelisted

assignment.comm:comment: Populates operational column to preserve source value.
Squeezes multiple dots to a single dot.

properties.comm:comment: Squeezing all whitespaces into single space character, removing accents, squeezing dots, replacing commas with dots, removing leading and trailing dot.
Validate precleansed email.
Sends valid emails directly to output, invalid for further parsing and cleansing.
Union emails on whitelist and valid (according Email Validate step)

properties.condition: containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_NULL") or ( containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_AMBIGUOUS_DOMAIN") and not containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_TLD") )
properties.comm:comment: Email that is empty or of which domain part consists only of a valid TLD is invalid.
Email has problems with format as a whole, not domain part problems.
Email with invalid TLD and ambiguous domain is an email without proper

regExpression.name: STOPWORD_WITH_COLON
regExpression.comm:comment: Assume that stopword is everything until the first colon (which is not supported in email address).

regExpression.name: STOPWORD_WITHOUT_COLON
regExpression.comm:comment: Assume that stopword is everything until the first space.

properties.comm:comment: Extracting leading stopword from email
Looks up possible stopword in the dictionary.

regExpression.name: QUOT_NAME_QUOT_LT_EMAIL_GT
regExpression.comm:comment: Extracting invalid email address from `"Name Surname" <em@il>` format.

regExpression.name: NAME_LT_EMAIL_GT
regExpression.comm:comment: Extracting invalid email address from `Name Surname <em@il>` format.

regExpression.name: ENC_EMAIL_CNE
regExpression.comm:comment: Extracting email enclosed in [], (), <>, ><, {}, "" and their multiplied variants (<<em@il>>, ...).

properties.comm:comment: Extracting email address enclosed in brackets.
Scores email unwrapping.
Email does not contain @.
Double original spaces, insert space in front of [, <, (, { and behind ], >, ), }.
Replaces synonyms with their respective symbols.

assignment.expression: substituteAll(@"([^ ]) ([^ ])", "$1$2", substituteAll(@"([^ ]) ([^ ])", "$1$2", pur_email)) //sadly one substituteAll cant change eg. "k k k" to "kkk" but only to "kk k"

properties.comm:comment: Revert changes made by preparation for tokenizer.
Email does not contain @.
Union same.
Email contains multiple '@'.
Union emails with: - two or more @ signs - no @ sign - empty - with valid TLD after @ (e.g. abc@com)

assignment.comm:comment: Deletes explanations from previous Validate Email step.
Removes trailing and leading dot from input.

properties.comm:comment: Prepares columns for next Email validation.
Validates the further cleansed email.
Sends valid emails directly to output, invalid for further parsing and cleansing.
Union valid flows

properties.condition: containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_NULL") or ( containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_AMBIGUOUS_DOMAIN") and not containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_TLD") )
properties.comm:comment: Email that is empty or of which domain part consists only of a valid TLD is invalid.
Email has problems with format as a whole, not domain part problems.

regExpression.name: EMAIL_WITHIN
regExpression.comm:comment: Extracting any email from within the input string.

regExpression.name: GUESS_EMAIL_WITHIN
regExpression.comm:comment: Extracting anything that at least a little resembles an email.

properties.comm:comment: Tries to extract an email from any kind of string using strickter and looser form of regular expression.
Regulax expression did not match.
Union invalid flows

assignment.comm:comment: Trims and removes leading and trailing dots.
Trims and removes leading and trailing dots.
Trims and removes leading and trailing dots.

assignment.expression: iif(matches(@"[.a-z]{2,6}", tmp_email_trailing, true), tmp_email_local + "@" + tmp_email_domain + "." + tmp_email_trailing, "")
assignment.comm:comment: If regexp matched only partially and the trailing part consists only of letters and dots with length of 2-6 characters, assume that part is TLD and create a new proposal.

properties.comm:comment: Precleanses email parts and proposes upto 2 possible email addresses.
Scores partial regexp email extraction.
Empties explanation column for the next Email Validate step.
Splits the proposals to their own respective records, creating a record descriptor group.
Validates proposed emails.
Sends valid emails directly to output, invalid for further parsing and cleansing.
Union valid flows

properties.condition: containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_NULL") or ( containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_AMBIGUOUS_DOMAIN") and not containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_TLD") ) or containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_ADDRESS")
properties.comm:comment: Email that is empty or of which domain part consists only of a valid TLD is invalid.
Union invalid flows
Email with invalid TLD and ambiguous domain is an email without proper
Email with invalid TLD and ambiguous domain is an email without proper
Union check flows for repairing TLD
Extracts email from "Name Surname" <em@il> format.
Adds internal columns.
Splits email to local, domain without TLD and TLD parts.

configAlg.name: Domain and TLD to lower case (Column Assigner)

properties.comm:comment: Converting domain and TLD to lower case.
Looks for correct form of misspelled TLD.
Looks for a well known domain.

properties.whenCondition: tmp_tld_known_domain is not null or tmp_tld_typo_corrected is not null

assignment.expression:
case( tmp_tld_typo_corrected is null, tmp_tld_known_domain,
tmp_tld_known_domain is null, tmp_tld_typo_corrected,
tmp_tld_known_domain != tmp_tld_typo_corrected, iif(levenshtein(tmp_tld_known_domain, pur_email_tld) < 2, tmp_tld_known_domain, tmp_tld_typo_corrected ),
tmp_tld_known_domain )

properties.comm:comment: Decides between the two TLD proposals if at least one is present, populates output column.
Scores TLD correction.
Removes internal columns.
Union check flows for guessing TLD
Extracts email from "Name Surname" <em@il> format.
Splits email to local, domain parts.
Looks for a well known domain.
Email is invalid.
Adds internal columns.
Multiply record, so each has its own unique TLD lenght found in the lookup.

assignment.comm:comment: The lenght of domain must be greater than that of the TLD, SLD must have at least one character.

assignment.expression: lower(iif(length(pur_email_domain) > tmp_tld_length , left(pur_email_domain, length(pur_email_domain) - tmp_tld_length), null))
assignment.comm:comment: The lenght of domain must be greater than that of the TLD, SLD must have at least one character.

properties.comm:comment: Takes a trailing substring of the domain name of the lenght of tmp_tld_lenght as a possible TLD.
Tries to match the proposed TLD.
Tries to match the domain and TLD guess against known email providers.
Selects the record with known domain and TLD or with the longest matched TLD from the group (in that order) and puts the whole email it into std_email.
Removes internal columns.
Union all flows
Record is not part of any record descriptor group.

orderBy.expression:
sco_pur_email + iif(std_email is null, 10000000, 0) // we don't to choose invalid email by mistake
//if record from two streams has same score, we prefer stream, which doesn't contain explanation "EML_AMBIGUOUS_DOMAIN" + iif(containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_AMBIGUOUS_DOMAIN"), 1, 0)

properties.comm:comment: Selects the best proposal (with the lowest score) from the group.
Union deduplicated multiple records flow and single record flow
Check if cleansed email is on blacklist

assignment.comm:comment: get the domain from standardized value. Substring from @ to last dot.

properties.comm:comment: Get the part of the domain from the standardized email input
checking standardized email domain against list of temporary domains

scoringCase.condition: std_email is null and containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_TLD") and not containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_AMBIGUOUS_DOMAIN")
std_email is null and containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_TLD") and containsWord(exp_pur_email_validation, "EML_AMBIGUOUS_DOMAIN")

properties.comm:comment: Set final explanations and score.

assignment.comm:comment: Only valid or very close to valid email goes to out_email.
Only values with score less than 10 000 can be in std_email.

properties.comm:comment: Populates out_email.
Removes internal columns.

requiredColumn.comm:comment: Standardized value of the email address - contains only valid values.

requiredColumn.name: std_name
requiredColumn.comm:comment: Column that stores the email address owner if recognised.

requiredColumn.name: out_email
requiredColumn.comm:comment: The best existing value of email.

requiredColumn.comm:comment: Explanations if invalid, cleansed or matched.

requiredColumn.comm:comment: Data quality score for value of email.
